NGSymposium goes online!

This year we decided to invite the speakers and NGSchool community to the virtual event. We plan keynote lectures of established experts in bioinformatics and some presentations by earlier-stage researchers. If you want to present your work visit Virtual NGsymposium page and register. If you just wish to attend lectures and presentations, then join us on Thursday, 24th and Friday, 25th September 2020 on YouTube!</b> Everybody is welcome!
